text: Peter Erne Baume (born 30 January 1935) is an Australian politician and doctor. He is a member of the Liberal Party. He was a Senator for New South Wales from 1974 to 1991. He also served as Minister for Aboriginal Affairs (1980–1982) and Minister for Education (1982–1983) in the Fraser Government. Baume was born in Sydney, New South Wales. He is the cousin of fellow Liberal Senator Michael Baume. He married Jennifer Broughton Tuson in 1958. The couple had two children. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Australian medical doctors Category:Government ministers of Australia Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians Category:Members of the Australian Senate Category:Politicians from Sydney Category:Order of Australia
title: Peter Baume
